text: The 1979 Vuelta a España was the 34th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Jerez de la Frontera, with a prologue individual time trial on 24 April, and Stage 10 occurred on 4 May with a stage to Zaragoza. The race finished in Madrid on 13 May. ==Prologue== 24 April 1979 — Jerez de la Frontera to Jerez de la Frontera, (ITT) {| |Prologue result and general classification after Prologue {| class="wikitable" |- !
